valid_articles.Title: Google dropping continuous scroll in search results

valid_articles.Title: Google said this change is to allow the search company to serve the search results faster on more searches, instead of automatically

valid_articles.Title: Like I said yesterday, if you're an affiliate marketer focused on finance, this is a GIANT heads-up. And affiliate marketers focused on other categories should pay close attention to both SERP features tested AND how AI overviews trigger for important queries.

valid_articles.Title: I think we'll continue to see more AI overviews for YMYL queries over time as Google improves the responses (and the sites being provided in those overviews). But I'm still seeing situations where AI overviews are not triggering at all for more sensitive queries.
